a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 10:15 am CDT

td.span: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 68. East wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

A 50 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. West wind 5 to 10 mph.
